fulltext:
Vo Hoang Que Ngan
Strategy & Business
Development Manager
  
Female
October 16, 1991
TanBinh District, HCMC, 
Vietnam





Personal Sumary
- Experience in Business Development; e-Commerce Platforms; Financial Analysis and Planning; Brand Identity; Sales &
Marketing; CRM & Customer Service.
- Outgoing and energetic with good communication and teamwork skills.
- Responsible, resourceful and reliable with all tasks and assignments.

UNIVERSITY OF ECONOMICS HO CHI MINH CITY
2014 - 2017
UNIVERSITY OF ECONOMICS HO CHI MINH CITY
2010 - 2013
Education
Major: Business Administration and Management
Master of Business Administration (M.B.A.)
Major: Corporate Finance
Bachelor's degree

HOP NHAT INTERNATIONAL EXPRESS JSC
March 2017 - Present
SALONDI VIET NAM
March 2016 -  February 2017
Work experience
Sales Manager
Hop Nhat International Joint Stock Company (HNC) was founded in 2001 with main services including courier and
transportation. Since 2017, I has worked as Sales Manager to grow the eCommerce Sales Department in HCMC, Southeast
Sales Executive Team.
Main responsibilities:
- Be responsible for achieving growth and sales targets (220.000 USD/month) in Cross-border e-Commerce Logistics including
AUS (Syd, Mel), GER (Fra, Berlin), FRANCE (Paris), SPAIN, (Madrid), CHINA (Guangzhou), UK (London), US (California,
Oregon, Texas), acquired more than 2000 customers in HCMC.
- Successfully managed and led 3 Leaders & 15 Sales Executive on Account & Order Management to meet and achieve sales
goals. Efficiently handling the entire sales process from lead generation to deal-closing.
- Coordinated closely with the Branch Companies and Representative offices of each countries to maintain the operation
inbetween.
- Strategically managing customer services, logistics operation & outstanding debts. Analyzing data to assess performance and
implement improvements. Having deep understanding about process of transporting e-commerce goods by air from abroad to
Vietnam including: exportation, importation, customs clearance and door to door delivery.
- Presenting sales, revenue and profits reports and realistic forecasts to sales director.
- Maintaining and developing a growing client database. Formulating creative business development and sales strategies raise
brand awareness.
-  Experts with knowledge about the needs and tastes of Vietnamese customers on the list of eCommerce products from foreign
markets such as fashion, healthy & beauty product, kid items, electronics ...
Co-Founder & Head of Business Development
Salondi.vn was established from Mind-connect Asia Co. The objective of Salondi.vn is to be the No.1 online beauty booking
service in Vietnam. I had joined this project at the beginning of designing business model and coordinating with the IT team &
design team. My main responsibilities were business development, marketing planning, merchant acquisition, HR management
and training, system operation.

Main responsibilities:
- Planned, Supervised, and Coordinated daily activity of 2 Designers, 5 Sales staffs, 2 Marketing staffs, coaching 8 Writing
freelancers and work with Developer team.
- Expanded Merchant network: exceed 200 beauty & wellness centers. 
- Highly acquired more than 16,000 viewers & 100 beauty service bookings within 4 months since launching.
MIND-CONNECT ASIA CO., LTD
June 2014 -  June 2016
Customer Service and Sales Manager
Mind-connect Asia Co., Ltd (MCA) is experts at serving innovative shopper marketing solutions in VietNam, including: POSM,
Creative Labeling & Displaying, Event Marketing Campaigns, Creative Promotion Idea.
Main responsibilities:
- Built and maintain relationships to our key customer: Calofic, Coca Cola, Jolibee, Hoang Yen Restaurant, Ajinomoto, Bosch
Vietnam, Spam, Delmonte, Monini,... 
- Managed the team include: 5 Designers, 3 Sales staffs, 3 Supervisors. 
- Sales target: 100.000 USD/month & more than 60 customers in Vietnam, Laos, Campodia. 
- Monitor the implementation of our client’s advertising projects in coordinating with the marketing & creation team, graphic
designers, POSM production department, … and our suppliers, partners.
- Work as an assistant Director to monitor, review sales and forecast estimates, statistical analysis and strategy business plan.
BAO VIET LIFE INSURANCE CORP.
May 2013 - May 2014
Agency Development Manager
Main responsibilities:
- Managed & be responsible sales performance for 9 agents at beginning. Recruitment and management of agency channel
team members.
- Being a pioneer to develop Nha Be & Binh Chanh district market for Bao Viet. Recruited more than 120 agents & get more
than 300 contracts in this new market. 
- Training, motivating and development of team members; be representative for Bao Viet Life to talk at life insurance seminars. 
- Building the insurance telesales training programs & courses
- Formulating sales strategies for different products and achieving targets.
HOANG LONG AGENCY REAL ESTATE CO., LTD
October 2009 - January 2012
Telesales team leader  (Part-time)
Main responsibilities:
- Planning, target setting and working with the telesales team;
- Report to the sale manager and assist her to update the potential customer data & improve team performance.
Honors & Awards
2008
- Top 25 in CASIO High School Math Competition 2008
2008
- Top 33 in National Student Math Competition 2008

Activities
YBA - HCMC
2012 - 2013
MC - Master of Ceremonies
- Cooperate to be responsible for the programe content & be a MC for monthly events.
MISS BEN TRE 2012 (COCONUT FESTIVAL)
March 2012 - April 2012
MC - Master of Ceremonies

References 
Mr. Nguyen Vu Thuan
Mr. Vu Tuan
Director at Mind-connect Asia 
Head of International Business Development at Hop Nhat
Email: nguyenvuthuan@yahoo.com
JSC
Mobile: (+84) 917 464 679
Email: msc.tuanvu@gmail.com 
Mobile: (+84) 944 007 226
